title: Emma Watson's 'Beauty and the Beast': Here's how the epic tale was brought to life - Watch | Zee News
text:
Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Excitement of the international cinema lovers is now at its peak and they are counting every minute as the release date of Emma Watson's upcoming film 'Beauty and the Beast' is inching closer. 
A behind the scene video is recently being shared on the social media and it explains how the epic tale was brought to life by the cast/crew of the flick. 
Watch: 
The movie is a story of how a simple girl 'Belle' from a village makes a cursed prince realise the value of inner beauty and helps him break the curse. MUST READ 
Disney's 'Beauty and the Beast', a live-action adaptation of the studio's animated namesake classic , also features Dan Stevens, Luke Evans, Kevin Kline, Josh Gad, Ewan McGregor, Stanley Tucci, Audra McDonald, GuguMbatha-Raw, Hattie Morahan, Nathan Mack, Ian McKellen and Emma Thompson. First Published: Friday, February 17, 2017 - 14:28 More from zeenews
